dct_description_sm: Topographical map indicating Strydenburg and other towns, villages, roads, railways, rivers, mountains and other features in the area of Strydenburg.
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Map folds into an outer cover.

11 ancillary maps (scale 1 in. to 0.5 miles) with notes: Zak Drift -- Nieuw Jaars Kraal Drift -- Christmas Drift -- Zwem Kuil Drift -- English Drift -- Mooi Draai Drift -- Read's Drift -- Drift near Zandfontein Farm -- Mark's Drift -- De Kalk Drift -- Kameel Drift.
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
